Package: unacloud

[Groovy] Class ConfigurationController

    • unacloud.ConfigurationController

    • This Controller contains actions to manage configuration services: shows and updates server variables, download and update agent. This class render pages for user or process request in services to update entities, there is session verification before all actions only administrator users can call this actions.

      Authors:
      CesarF
